effects.text: You explode in a burst of harmless glitter; all creatures within 10 feet are blinded until the end of their next turn.
You take 2d10 force damage as chaotic energy surges through you.
You are polymorphed into a sheep for 1 minute (DC 15 Wisdom save ends early).
You are stunned until the start of your next turn as your mind blanks out in cosmic static.
You cast Fireball centered on yourself.
Your clothes vanish for 1 minute. Embarrassing, but not harmful.
You and one random creature within 30 feet swap places.
You fall prone and your legs turn into jelly for 1 round.
Your skin becomes translucent, revealing your organs for 1 hour. Disadvantage on Charisma checks.
A spectral hand slaps you for 1d6 bludgeoning damage and disappears.
You become intensely magnetic for 1 minute; metal objects stick to you.
You are frightened of your own shadow for 1 minute.
You emit the smell of rotten eggs for 24 hours.
A random ally within 30 feet takes 1d8 lightning damage as sparks jump between you.
Your arms shrink to half their normal length for 1 hour.
You can’t speak for 1 minute; instead, bubbles float from your mouth when you try.
You are surrounded by illusory spiders crawling on your body for 1 minute.
You sneeze uncontrollably for 1 minute, unable to take the Attack action.
Your shadow whispers insults for the next hour. Disadvantage on Stealth checks.
You are poisoned for 1 minute as your stomach churns with magic.
The nearest unattended object animates and tries to bite you (AC 10, 1 HP).
Your hair catches fire (harmlessly) for 1 minute; you can’t extinguish it.
You become invisible for 1 round and reappear 10 feet in a random direction.
Your hands emit harmless smoke for 10 minutes.
A chorus of ghostly voices sing your name ominously for 30 seconds.
You and one random creature exchange memories of the last 24 hours.
You lose 1d4 teeth, replaced instantly with tiny glowing gems.
A random creature within 30 feet polymorphs into a frog for 1 minute (save negates).
For 1 minute, everything you touch turns to soft clay.
You age 1d10 years instantly.
You regain 1d10 years of youth instantly.
A localized thunderclap knocks everyone within 10 feet prone.
You emit light like a torch, but the light flickers and whispers unsettling phrases.
A random song plays loudly around you for 1 minute.
You levitate 10 feet off the ground for 10 seconds, then drop safely.
A harmless illusion of a dragon swoops overhead and roars.
Your skin turns plaid for 1 hour.
A chicken appears and follows you for the next 24 hours.
For 1 minute, any creature that touches you becomes slightly static-shocked.
Your voice becomes booming and divine for 1 hour.
All nearby flames turn blue for 10 minutes.
You are surrounded by spectral butterflies for 1 minute.
A gentle raincloud appears above your head, following you for 1 minute.
Your shadow performs interpretive dance for 1 minute.
You sprout feathers instead of hair for 24 hours.
You speak only in rhyme for 10 minutes.
You teleport 10 feet into an unoccupied space of your choice.
Your next spell casts silently, even if it normally has verbal components.
Your fingertips glow like candles for 1 hour.
You are compelled to dance uncontrollably for 1 round.
An illusory halo appears above your head for 1 hour.
You can speak one random language fluently for 10 minutes.
All food within 30 feet becomes perfectly seasoned.
Your next attack roll automatically hits, but deals minimum damage.
A harmless floating eye follows you for 1 hour, mimicking your expressions.
You briefly glow with starlight; creatures within 5 feet make a DC 13 Con save or be blinded until your next turn.
You summon a random harmless beast (DM chooses) for 1 minute.
All ink within 10 feet turns invisible for 1 hour.
You grow a small horn that hums softly when magic is nearby.
You are surrounded by faint music that only you can hear.
A minor illusion of your ideal self appears beside you for 1 minute.
The air temperature around you shifts by 10 degrees in your favor for 1 hour.
A spectral butler appears and politely hands you a drink.
For 1 minute, small flowers bloom where you step.
You gain darkvision out to 60 feet for 1 hour.
A golden aura surrounds you, granting advantage on saving throws against fear for 1 minute.
You gain 10 temporary hit points.
Your next spell is automatically cast at one level higher without consuming an extra slot.
A spectral shield hovers near you, granting +2 AC for 1 minute.
You gain resistance to one random damage type for 1 hour.
You immediately regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower.
You gain advantage on all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
For 1 minute, you can see invisible creatures and objects.
You can fly (20 ft speed) for 1 minute.
Your movement speed doubles for 1 minute.
You regain all hit points lost in the last 10 minutes.
You gain truesight out to 30 feet for 1 minute.
You gain the benefit of the 'Bless' spell for 1 minute.
Your body briefly becomes ethereal, letting you move through walls for 6 seconds.
You summon a harmless celestial spirit that follows you for 1 hour and hums pleasantly.
Your spell save DC increases by +2 for the next 10 minutes.
You gain a burst of insight — learn one hidden fact about your surroundings (DM discretion).
All allies within 30 feet gain 1d8 temporary hit points.
You are immune to being frightened for the next hour.
You can teleport up to 1 mile to a location you can visualize once within the next 10 minutes.
You cast Mirror Image centered on yourself without using a spell slot.
You gain resistance to all damage for 1 round.
You gain the effects of the Haste spell for 1 minute.
You summon a spectral familiar that obeys you for 1 hour.
You can immediately cast one 1st-level spell you know without expending a slot or components.
Your next critical hit deals maximum possible damage.
For 1 minute, you emit bright light in a 20-foot radius that heals allies 1 HP each round.
A shimmering aura surrounds you; allies within 10 feet have advantage on saving throws for 1 minute.
You gain the ability to cast one random spell of 5th level or lower once in the next 24 hours.
Your next failed saving throw is instead treated as a success.
A celestial choir sings your name; all allies regain 2d10 hit points.
You gain a +2 bonus to all rolls for the next hour.
You are surrounded by divine energy — for 1 minute, all attacks against you have disadvantage.
You ascend briefly, levitating in radiant light; for 1 minute, you gain flight, resistance to all damage, and your next spell automatically succeeds.
